author: James Joyce
text: Dear Curran: Forgive me if I do not write to you for a few days. I want to write to you a long letter but I am still far too broken down to attempt it. I hope you received my solicitors’ cabled remittance (£20) and that you will let me know what I owe you…. I thank you from my heart for your great kindness to me in this dark hour.
